subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks that a local variable is declared and/or assigned, but not used. Doesn't support pattern variables yet. Doesn't check array components as array components are classified as different kind of variables by JLS.

tr.td: Allow variables named with a single underscore (known as unnamed variables in Java 21+).
